sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> with a <radical>mouth</radical> eats a <radical>beggar</radical> and his <radical>stool</radical>, which were on the <radical>ground</radical> next to him, which seems to be a bit <kanji>extreme</kanji>, don't you think?
meaningInfo: The beggar was just sitting there on a stool! Why so extreme?
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>extreme</kanji> tree now turns on you and wants to eat you, but luckily <reading>Goku</reading> (<ja>ごく</ja>) from Dragon Ball Z is with you and he manages to <reading>cloak you</reading> (<ja>きょく</ja>) both with his cloaking device just in the nick of time.
readingInfo: You know Goku from Dragon Ball, right? Imagine him pulling out his cloaking device extremely quickly and cloaking you both, just as the extreme tree's mouth is about to close around you. Phew, that was extremely close.
